Who is tony stark

Tony Stark is a fictional character and the main protagonist in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, also known as Iron Man. He is a billionaire inventor, industrialist, and philanthropist who creates a powered exoskeleton suit to save his life and later uses it to fight crime and injustice.
